Hi @forencen, thanks for raising this issue. It seems that you are using Node 18 and npm > 6, which truffle doesn't support currently. Can you please downgrade your `node` version to **16** with `npm` version **6** and try to install truffle again with `npm install -g truffle`?

We recommend using [nvm to manage multiple nodeJS versions](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/install#using-a-node-version-manager-to-install-node-js-and-npm). `node` versions > 15 comes with `npm` v7.x or v8.x by default. To set the `npm` version to 6.x for Node 16, you can use the below command - 
`$ npm install -global npm@6`

I had the same issue , used this code `npm install -g truffle@5.4.29`
Make sure to close this issue if it worked
